title: Unfearing
description: Natasha has finally learned the truth about herself, but sheâ€™s also discovered that having so much power comes with a price. After a close encounter with dark forces, Nat decides to trust the one person Chace warned her against, traveling to a dangerous place where no Ledarian is welcomed. Love is tested and more secrets are uncovered as Nat seeks a way to relinquish her vulnerable state and face her most powerful threat ever.
author: Shane Morgan
